name: Last Bloom (Ludum Dare 38)
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 38 game jam! (LD Entry Here)

Controls:
Keep enemies off the board so the Last Bloom doesn't sink!
WASD (or Arrow Keys) = Move & Jump
(You can also use Spacebar to Jump)
Left-Click Mouse to Attack

Credits
Art, Level Design, Animation: Noah Banks (noahbanksmadeit.tumblr.com)

Programming, Effects, Level Building: Ariel Banks (@NvrSkipGameDay)

Music (we did not make this!):
Mountain Emperor Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
